image.alt: Smiling patient with orthodontist at Frigo Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: At Frigo Orthodontics, we’re proud to serve families across the Mississippi Gulf Coast with expert orthodontic care in a warm, welcoming environment. For more than 25 years, Dr. Christopher Frigo and his team have combined advanced treatments and personal attention to create lasting, confident smiles.
We use modern digital tools and efficient workflows to make care predictable and comfortable. From first consult to lifetime retainer support, our goal is a smooth experience that fits your life.

items.title: Experienced Care
items.text: Dr. Frigo brings more than 25 years of clinical experience and a patient-first philosophy that prioritizes facial balance and conservative, proven treatment plans.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.text: We use digital 3D scanning, precise bracket placement, and modern mechanics to plan treatment efficiently and reduce chair time.

items.title: Non-Surgical Options
items.text: For many complex cases we offer modern, non-surgical mechanics such as TADs and Damon-style approaches to avoid unnecessary procedures.

items.title: Community Commitment
items.text: We support our community with shuttle service, veteran benefits, and lifetime retainer support so care fits your family’s needs.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Christopher Frigo, DDS, is an experienced orthodontist who has created beautiful smiles for more than 25 years. He combines a holistic treatment philosophy with advanced training in Damon techniques and extensive Invisalign experience to match each patient with the most appropriate, conservative plan.
Dr. Frigo has treated thousands of patients, prefers treatments that preserve facial balance, and uses modern mechanics to achieve results without unnecessary extractions or surgery when possible.

image.alt: Dr. Christopher Frigo, DDS, orthodontist

paragraphs.text: We offer Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, modern bracket systems, lifetime retainer options, and non-surgical care for complex cases — all planned with digital technology for predictable results.

image.alt: Patient holding clear aligners for Invisalign treatment
Orthodontist placing braces
In-house lab creating retainers and appliances
Non-surgical jaw correction patient care

testimonials.author: Sunny S.
testimonials.testimonial: “Dr. Frigo was the ONLY orthodontist willing to work on my child WITHOUT breaking her jaw due to uneven bone growth. Dr. Frigo and his amazing staff have researched and studied to address some of the issues that arose during her treatment and have done nothing short of AMAZING BEAUTIFUL WORK! … You won’t regret it! Thank you Frigo and staff for all you have done and continue to do for us!! We love y’all!!”

testimonials.author: Justin P.
testimonials.testimonial: “The experience with Dr. Frigo was amazing. They were determined to make sure I had a great smile and to make sure everything was just right. … Basically, everyone there made my experience great. Thanks to them, I have a better smile and teeth.”

testimonials.author: Kristy T.
testimonials.testimonial: “We had our final consultation at Frigo Orthodontics and Lyiah was fantastic from start to finish. She walked us through everything clearly, answered all our questions with patience. … Thank you, Lyiah, for making our final visit a smooth and positive one.”

testimonials.author: Jeremey Puckett

og_meta.title: Home - Frigo Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Frigo Orthodontics provides expert orthodontic care in Gulfport and Biloxi, MS. Dr. Christopher Frigo offers Invisalign®, Damon braces, retainers, and modern,非‑

image.alt: Dr. Christopher Frigo smiling, professional headshot

paragraphs.text: Investing in futures, one smile at a time. Frigo Orthodontics provides personalized orthodontic care for families across the Gulf Coast, focusing on long-term health, function, and confidence.

We combine industry-leading technology with a patient-first approach: in-house lab fabrication, digital scanning with iTero, the Damon System, and selective use of TADs when needed. That technology supports efficient, comfortable care tailored to each patient.

Our team treats children, teens, and adults, offering early guidance to set a healthy path for growing smiles and delivering thoughtful options for adolescent and adult treatment. We emphasize avoiding unnecessary extractions or surgery whenever safe and appropriate.

From friendly scheduling to gentle clinical techniques, our goal is to make orthodontics accessible and reassuring. Patients leave our office with durable, natural-looking smiles and the confidence to share them.

image.alt: Dr. Christopher Frigo in clinical setting

paragraphs.text: Dr. Christopher Frigo, DDS, is an orthodontist who has created beautiful smiles for more than twenty-five years. He practices a holistic approach that preserves facial balance, prioritizes non-extraction solutions when appropriate, and focuses on restoring and maintaining facial vertical dimension.
Dr. Frigo has treated thousands of patients using contemporary biomechanics and evidence-informed techniques, always aiming for outcomes that improve both function and facial esthetics.

image.alt: Dr. Frigo consulting with a patient

paragraphs.text: Dr. Frigo has trained with Damon System pioneers around the world, including mentorship with Dr. Chris Chang. That advanced training informs his use of the Damon system and modern bracket mechanics to enhance smile width and lip support while minimizing cumbersome appliances.

He has extensive experience with Invisalign<sup>®</sup> as well, having successfully treated well over one thousand aligner cases. This experience helps the team select the best modality for each patient, whether braces or clear aligners.

image.alt: Digital scanner used for orthodontic treatment planning

paragraphs.text: Dr. Frigo has been married to Kerri Breland Frigo for more than thirty years and they have four children. Outside of the office he studies classical guitar and enjoys life with their two foster dogs, Molly and Murphy.
He values community connections and looks forward to helping patients of all ages find comfort and confidence through thoughtful orthodontic care.

image.alt: Dr. Frigo smiling in the office
In-house lab and orthodontic appliances

paragraphs.text: Invisalign<sup>®</sup> uses a series of clear, removable aligners to move teeth with predictable, esthetic results. At Frigo Orthodontics we pair digital scanning and experience-based case selection to determine when aligners or braces will best meet a patient’s goals.

image.alt: Digital iTero scanner used for Invisalign treatment planning

paragraphs.text: The practice has treated well over one thousand Invisalign<sup>®</sup> cases. That depth of experience helps our team identify which smiles will respond best to clear aligners and which will benefit more from fixed appliances.

image.alt: Orthodontic appliances fabricated in the in-house lab

paragraphs.text: Clear aligners are discreet and convenient for many lifestyles. We discuss realistic expectations, estimated timelines, and retention plans so patients choose the option that fits their clinical needs and daily life.

image.alt: Lab work for aligner and retainer fabrication

items.name: KaDaryl “KD” Durden
items.bio: Lab Director and in-house technician certified in fabricating orthodontic appliances. KD leads the lab that produces retainers, appliances, and mouthguards, ensuring fast turnaround and quality control.

image.alt: KaDaryl KD Durden working in the in-house lab

items.name: Frigo Team
items.bio: Our Gulfport and Biloxi teams include front desk staff, treatment coordinators, and orthodontic assistants who coordinate care, scheduling, and patient education across both offices.

image.alt: Frigo Orthodontics clinical and administrative team group photo

items.name: Front Desk / Patient Services
items.bio: Our front desk manages appointments, paperwork, and the shuttle program. They help make each visit efficient and welcoming for families and adult patients.

image.alt: Front desk representative welcoming patients

image.alt: Smiling patients in a bright orthodontic office

paragraphs.text: At Frigo Orthodontics, we prioritize less-invasive options when treating jaw and bite problems. Dr. Frigo evaluates each case to determine whether advanced appliance therapy and modern anchorage techniques can correct complex alignments without surgery.
We use a combination of contemporary tools and treatment strategies to address many jaw discrepancies, offering patients alternatives that reduce recovery time and procedural risk.

image.alt: Orthodontic early intervention illustration

paragraphs.text: Treatment may combine self-ligating braces, temporary anchorage devices, palate expanders and targeted mechanics to move teeth and guide jaw growth without cutting tissue.

image.alt: Orthodontic appliances used in corrective treatment

paragraphs.text: Non-surgical approaches can reduce operative risk, cost, and downtime. For children especially, avoiding invasive surgery lowers anesthesia‑related complications and long-term developmental concerns.

image.alt: Family smiling after orthodontic care
Smiling family enjoying time together

paragraphs.text: The Damon Ultima system uses low‑friction mechanics and passive sliding brackets to move teeth efficiently. This approach can shorten treatment time and increase comfort for many cases.

image.alt: Close-up of braces mechanics

paragraphs.text: Patients often report fewer adjustments and easier hygiene compared with traditional elastic‑ligated systems. Damon braces are used routinely in our practice for complex alignment goals.

image.alt: Patient smiling with orthodontic appliance
Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Metal braces remain a reliable, cost‑effective option for many alignment and bite concerns. They are durable and adaptable for complex movements when needed.
Our team selects bracket and wire systems to balance efficiency and patient comfort, and we guide you through every adjustment to ensure predictable progress.

image.alt: Patient with traditional metal braces

paragraphs.text: Invisalign<sup>®</sup> aligners are clear, removable trays that use 3D treatment planning to shift teeth incrementally. They are a discreet option for many adults and teens.
Because the aligners are removable, patients keep normal brushing and eating routines, while we monitor progress with precise digital scans.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligner being positioned

paragraphs.text: Lingual braces are placed on the tongue side of the teeth, making them invisible from the front. They are an option for patients seeking a hidden fixed solution.

image.alt: Clinical orthodontic operatory with modern equipment

paragraphs.text: A palatal expander widens the upper jaw to correct crossbites and create space for crowded teeth. It is commonly used in growing patients to guide arch development.
Expanders are typically recommended for children and adolescents whose jaws are still developing, allowing predictable skeletal changes.

image.alt: Dental scanning technology in use

paragraphs.text: Most patients adapt quickly; the device is adjusted gradually and monitored to achieve the desired width while keeping oral hygiene straightforward.

image.alt: Digital X-ray equipment used for orthodontic planning

paragraphs.text: Correcting jaw width early can reduce the need for extractions or more invasive correction later, supporting stable, long‑term results.

image.alt: 3D planning software for orthodontic cases
Modern dental office interior

paragraphs.text: Retainers protect your smile after active treatment. We provide both bonded permanent retainers and removable clear retainers tailored to each patient.
Frigo Orthodontics fabricates many appliances in‑house, offering a lifetime replacement program so results remain stable long term.

image.alt: Young woman holding an orthodontic retainer

paragraphs.text: TADs are small, temporary screws that provide anchorage for difficult tooth movements. They let us accomplish specific corrections without relying on extractions or major surgery.

image.alt: 3D orthodontic planning software imagery
Family enjoying time together

paragraphs.text: Find clear, practical answers about treatment options, scheduling, insurance, and caring for braces or clear aligners.

accordion.header: What orthodontic treatments do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We provide traditional metal and ceramic braces, clear Invisalign<sup>®</sup> aligners, early interceptive care for children, and custom retainers to protect your results.

image.alt: Happy Family Portrait

accordion.header: At what age should my child see an orthodontist?

paragraphs.text: The American Association of Orthodontists recommends an evaluation by age 7. Early visits let us catch growth concerns and plan the simplest, most effective care.

image.alt: Couple Enjoying Time Together

accordion.header: How should I care for braces or clear aligners?

paragraphs.text: Brush and floss carefully around brackets and wires. For aligners, remove them to eat and brush before reinserting. Bring any concerns to your next visit so we can adjust care tips to your needs.

image.alt: Collaborative Team Spirit Moment

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We accept most major dental insurance plans and offer flexible monthly payment options. Our team will review benefits with you and help set up financing if needed.

image.alt: Smiling Man Working at Desk

accordion.header: How can I schedule an appointment?

paragraphs.text: Call us at 519-979-5500 or use our online contact form to request an appointment. We’ll work with your schedule to find a convenient time for your family.

image.alt: Mother and Daughter Smiling Together
Family enjoying time together
